name: Brain Ghosts (TGDJam)
description:
No I don't know why i made the tagline that but I'm keeping it.

This is my submission to the trans game dev discord server's birthday jam and also MY FIRST GAME! Sorry about the everything.

known issues:

  • the text on longer choice options runs out of the image - all my final hour attempts to fix this only made it worse
  • The UI in general is kind of bad honestly but functional
  • probably a lot of typos and grammatical mistakes i missed - Ink scripts are hard to proofread
     

some common bug I found in testing that i think i fixed all of but might still be in the game are

  • Lines of dialogue with missing names
  • When the game doesn't know what part of the script to send you to next it can seemingly randomly jump you ahead
